author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Refactored: Replaced the class names which are passed in
* Added a reference name setting which are used by the converter
and handler. This allows the developer to reference the handler
* Add a settings array which can be used by the handler as configuration.
# This fixes the issue with having to use the class name as reference and
# allows the handler to receive more options in the future.

author: fh:ez.no
msg: - save() works (only for mysql at the moment, need to add sequence support in the definition for oracle and pgsql)
